install.name: Content - Jfusion
install.author: JFusion Development Team
JFusion Development Team
install.description: This is a discussion bot plugin for jFusion. Compatible plugins will have discussion bot settings available in their configuration page. To use for a single article place {jfusion_discuss id#} where id# is the id of the thread. Enable auto mode in the plugin's configuration to have jFusion take care of everything automatically including creating the thread, posting the first post with either the article itself or a link back to the article, and adding appropriate links to the thread from the article.
